description: Lists managed endpoints based on a set of parameters. A managed endpoint is a gateway that connects Amazon EMR Studio to Amazon EMR on EKS so that Amazon EMR Studio can communicate with your virtual cluster.

parameters.name: virtualClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual cluster.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: The types of the managed endpoints. (string) ---

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: The states of the managed endpoints. (string) ---

nested_items.name: endpoints
nested_items.description: The managed endpoints to be listed.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: virtualClusterId
nested_items.description: The ID of the endpoint's virtual cluster.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: releaseLabel
nested_items.description: The EMR release version to be used for the endpoint.

nested_items.name: executionRoleArn
nested_items.description: The execution role ARN of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: certificateArn
nested_items.description: The certificate ARN of the endpoint. This field is under deprecation and will be removed in future.

nested_items.name: certificateAuthority
nested_items.description: The certificate generated by emr control plane on customer behalf to secure the managed endpoint.

nested_items.name: certificateArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the certificate generated for managed endpoint.

nested_items.name: certificateData
nested_items.description: The base64 encoded PEM certificate data generated for managed endpoint.

nested_items.name: configurationOverrides
nested_items.description: The configuration settings that are used to override existing configurations for endpoints.

nested_items.name: applicationConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configurations for the application running by the job run.

nested_items.name: classification
nested_items.description: The classification within a configuration.

nested_items.name: properties
nested_items.description: A set of properties specified within a configuration classification.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: configurations
nested_items.description: A list of additional configurations to apply within a configuration object.

nested_items.name: monitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configurations for monitoring.

nested_items.name: managedLogs
nested_items.description: The entity that controls configuration for managed logs.

nested_items.name: allowAWSToRetainLogs
nested_items.description: Determines whether Amazon Web Services can retain logs.

nested_items.name: encryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the encryption key for logs.

nested_items.name: persistentAppUI
nested_items.description: Monitoring configurations for the persistent application UI.

nested_items.name: cloudWatchMonitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: Monitoring configurations for CloudWatch.

nested_items.name: logGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the log group for log publishing.

nested_items.name: logStreamNamePrefix
nested_items.description: The specified name prefix for log streams.

nested_items.name: s3MonitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: Amazon S3 configuration for monitoring log publishing.

nested_items.name: logUri
nested_items.description: Amazon S3 destination URI for log publishing.

nested_items.name: containerLogRotationConfiguration
nested_items.description: Enable or disable container log rotation.

nested_items.name: rotationSize
nested_items.description: The file size at which to rotate logs. Minimum of 2KB, Maximum of 2GB.

nested_items.name: maxFilesToKeep
nested_items.description: The number of files to keep in container after rotation.

nested_items.name: serverUrl
nested_items.description: The server URL of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the endpoint was created.

nested_items.name: securityGroup
nested_items.description: The security group configuration of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: The subnet IDs of the endpoint.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: stateDetails
nested_items.description: Additional details of the endpoint state.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: The reasons why the endpoint has failed.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of endpoints to return.
